verificationLevels.name: Email Verified
benefits: Can receive and respond to reviews

trustScoreFactors.name: Verification Level
trustScoreFactors.description: Higher verification tiers (Email, Identity, Enterprise) significantly boost trust scores. Enterprise verification provides the maximum boost.

trustScoreFactors.name: Uptime & Reliability
trustScoreFactors.description: Consistent availability and response time. Measured over 30-day rolling window with 99.9% uptime as benchmark.

trustScoreFactors.name: User Reviews
trustScoreFactors.description: Average rating from verified users, weighted by recency. Recent reviews have higher impact. Minimum 5 reviews required.

trustScoreFactors.name: Account Age
trustScoreFactors.description: Longer-standing accounts receive higher trust. Full credit after 1 year of active operation.

trustScoreFactors.name: Community Engagement
trustScoreFactors.description: Response rate to reviews, forum participation, documentation quality, and support responsiveness.

incidentResponseTimeline.description: Automated acknowledgment sent to reporter. Report enters triage queue with unique tracking ID.
Trust & Safety team conducts preliminary assessment. Critical reports (malware, security threats) escalated immediately.
In-depth review of reported content, user history, and evidence. May contact reporter for additional information.
Decision made and enforcement actions implemented (warning, suspension, or account termination). All parties notified.
Subject has 14 days to appeal decision. Appeals reviewed by separate team within 5 business days.
